targets.expr: sum(rate(zeek_cpu_time_per_function_type_seconds{zeek_cluster="$cluster", function_type="built-in function", node=~".*manager"}[$__interval])) / scalar(count(count by (node) (zeek_hook_cpu_time_seconds{zeek_cluster="$cluster", node=~".*manager"})))

sum(rate(zeek_cpu_time_per_function_type_seconds{zeek_cluster="$cluster", function_type=~"(event|hook|script-land function)", node=~".*manager"}[$__interval])) / scalar(count(count by (node) (zeek_hook_cpu_time_seconds{zeek_cluster="$cluster", node=~".*manager"})))

sum(rate(zeek_cpu_time_per_function_type_seconds{zeek_cluster="$cluster", function_type="built-in function", node=~".*worker-.*"}[$__interval])) / scalar(count(count by (node) (zeek_hook_cpu_time_seconds{zeek_cluster="$cluster", node=~".*worker-.*"})))

sum(rate(zeek_cpu_time_per_function_type_seconds{zeek_cluster="$cluster", function_type=~"(event|hook|script-land function)", node=~".*worker-.*"}[$__interval])) / scalar(count(count by (node) (zeek_hook_cpu_time_seconds{zeek_cluster="$cluster", node=~".*worker-.*"})))

sum(rate(zeek_cpu_time_per_function_type_seconds{zeek_cluster="$cluster", function_type="built-in function", node=~".*proxy"}[$__interval])) / scalar(count(count by (node) (zeek_hook_cpu_time_seconds{zeek_cluster="$cluster", node=~".*proxy"})))

sum(rate(zeek_cpu_time_per_function_type_seconds{zeek_cluster="$cluster", function_type=~"(event|hook|script-land function)", node=~".*proxy"}[$__interval])) / scalar(count(count by (node) (zeek_hook_cpu_time_seconds{zeek_cluster="$cluster", node=~".*proxy"})))

sum(rate(zeek_cpu_time_per_function_type_seconds{zeek_cluster="$cluster", function_type="built-in function", node=~".*logger"}[$__interval])) / scalar(count(count by (node) (zeek_hook_cpu_time_seconds{zeek_cluster="$cluster", node=~".*logger"})))

sum(rate(zeek_cpu_time_per_function_type_seconds{zeek_cluster="$cluster", function_type=~"(event|hook|script-land function)", node=~".*logger"}[$__interval])) / scalar(count(count by (node) (zeek_hook_cpu_time_seconds{zeek_cluster="$cluster", node=~".*logger"})))
